entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:33 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -37.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 12:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -37.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -41.9°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 38.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:26 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
